resources.string: Let’s achieve your set goal together. When you get distracted, tap me! You can quit but I AM HERE to help you achieve your goal so let’s get this going.

string-array.name: buddy_smiling_sayings
string-array.item: "Think about your strengths and the resources that you can draw upon to help you with difficult assignments or test information."
"Think about things that make you feel good whenever you are feeling frustrated about what you need to get done."
"Think about things that make you feel good whenever you are feeling frustrated about what you need to get done."
"Take a 5–10 minute break to clear your head when you want to quit studying but know you should stay with it."
"Talk aloud to yourself about the materials you are studying to keep you from getting distracted by other thoughts or activities."

string-array.name: buddy_grinning_sayings
string-array.item:
"The four most beautiful words in our common language:
I told you so. - Gore Vidal

So let's complete this goal!"
"The only way to keep your health is to eat what you don't want, drink what you don't like, and do what you'd rather not.\nMark Twain"
"The difference between stupidity and genius is that genius has its limits.\n\nAlbert Einstein"
"The only thing that interferes with my learning is my education.\n\nAlbert Einstein"
"The world today doesn't make sense, so why should I paint pictures that do?\n\nPablo Picasso"

string-array.name: buddy_relieved_sayings
string-array.item: "Not going well?\nIf two wrongs don't make a right, try three."
"Life is short, smile while you still have teeth."
"What keeps me going is goals.\n\nMuhammad Ali"
"Make each day count by setting specific goals to succeed, then putting forth every effort to exceed your own expectations.\n\nLes Brown"
"Each of you, as an individual, must pick your own goals. Listen to others, but do not become a blind follower.\n\nThurgood Marshall"
"Imagine yourself moving through the assignment or answering the test questions without much difficulty."
"When you can't get down to studying or get frustrated or interrupted during studying, count to 10 to help you get on track with it."

string-array.name: buddy_thinking_sayings
string-array.item: "Think about the goal that you have set for yourself and how what you do now may affect your future."
"Think about how great (how relieved) you will feel when you get this finished."
"Think about the tasks that if you don't continue this learning session you will fall behind in others such as the rest of your courses."
"Think of interesting or different ways to make studying more fun or challenging for you."
"Get to it and concentrate, this is an important exam/paper/assignment."

string-array.name: buddy_goofy_sayings
string-array.item: "My friend thinks he is smart. He told me an onion is the only food that makes you cry so I threw a coconut at his face."
"Teacher: \"Which book has helped you the most in your life?\"\nStudent: \"My father\'s check book!\""
"Q: If you have 13 apples in one hand and 10 oranges in the other, what do you have?\n\n A: Big hands."
"Math Teacher: \"If I have 5 bottles in one hand and 6 in the other hand, what do I have?\"\n\nStudent: \"A drinking problem.\""
